summary: This Is How The Leader Of The Imperial Army Should Look Like.
descriptionHtml:
[b]The Real Tullius[/b]

This Is How The Leader Of The Imperial Army Should Look Like.
He Has Better Armor And A New Face.

The Armor Is Lootable, But You Can Only Wear It At Weight 0 Or 100.
General Tullius Is Now Weight 100.
I Changed The Original Armor With Outfit Studio, But Somehow The Weight Levels Inbetween Are Glitching With The Armor Meshes.
I Do Not Know How To Fix This.
If I Do I Will Update This Mod.

Instalation: Place In Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005
